text: Anthony Lopez (born January 22, 1994), better known as Tony Dreams, is an American singer and songwriter from Waco, Texas. In 2016, he began to gain recognition following the release of a collection of four singles, entitled ‘The One’, ‘Come Over’, ‘Do That’, and his first major release ‘Rewind’.R. (2016, November 21). Tony Dreams - Rewind. Retrieved April 15, 2017, from http://www.hofisbetter.com/tony-dreams-rewind/ ‘Rewind’ was the official debut single for Dreams. It was released on September 10, 2016 through TopNotch Music.Rewind - Single by Tony Dreams on Apple Music. (2016, September 10). Retrieved April 15, 2017, from https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/rewind- single/id1150914790 ‘Rewind’ was the product of Dreams’ collaboration with DJsNeverEndingStory, former in house producer for the Grammy award-winning music production team, The Trak Starz.Explosive Video: Tony Dreams "Rewind". (2016, September 27). Retrieved April 15, 2017, from http://kaboom- magazine.com/2016/09/27/explosive-video-tony-dreams-rewind/ Dreams’ other singles garnered success in the R&B;/urban community but failed to make a mark in mainstream music. Dreams currently resides in Northern California with his girlfriend Emily Faubert.B. (2016, November 14). Rising Star Tony Dreams Talks Success of New Single, "Rewind" & What's Next. Retrieved April 15, 2017, from http://fistintheair.com/2016/11/14/rising-star-tony-dreams-talks-success-of- new-single-rewind-whats-next/ ==References== Category:Singers from Texas Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American singers
title: Tony Dreams
